thread.title: India’s Impact Investment leaders launch Social Finance India in New Delhi

author: cnbc.com
title: India’s Impact Investment leaders launch Social Finance India in New Delhi

organizations.name: al steering group for impact investment

text: New Delhi, India, May 14, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Social Finance Global Network (SFGN) and The Global Steering Group for Impact Investment (GSG) today announced the launch of Social Finance India (SF-IND) and first three of its Directors- Rajiv Lall, Ashish Dhawan, and, Vikram Gandhi. Rajiv Lall will Chair the initiative. SF- IND will be a new Section 8 non-profit intermediary which will galvanize the Indian impact investment space. Social Finance India’s first two products- India Impact Fund of Funds (IIFF) and India Education Outcomes Fund (IEOF) will launch in 2018. SF-IND also launched its website,
